availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: A Kentucky farmer. Lived in Hopkins County, Kentucky in 1860. Married twice, first to Amelia A. Rash McEuen and a second time to Elizabeth R. McGary McEuen. Father of Mary E. McEuen and a daughter and son who died in infancy.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 44; "Thomas J. McEuen," (https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=67171609&ref=acom) (accessed on March 23, 2017).
